body.p:
Louisville Augt 19th 1862
N. Wolfe Esqr.
Dr Sir
This will be handed you by Mrs Huff of this city who visits Frankfort to present to the Governor a Petition for the Pardon of her son.

Her husband is a solider in Col Woodruffs regiment now being recruited & he will take the son with him if he is discharged. Will you Introduce Mrs Huff to the Governor & give her such assistance in the accomplishment of her object in visiting Frankfort as may be consistent with your duties --

Very Truly yr Friend,
Geo. W. Johnston.

Nathl Wolfe Esqr
Mrs Huff } Frankfort
